comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Edward S. Smith was illegally imprisoned because he insisted on his right to walk down a public thoroughfare in Warren (according to The Commonwealth., April 18, 1913, Image 1, with the same photo).

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for this information B-59. We'll add some of this information to the records for both Edward Smith and his wife the next time we update.
